description: [Status: preview] [Name: suspicious-xml-etree-import] [Message: xml.etree methods are vulnerable to XML attacks] What it does Checks for imports of the xml.etree.cElementTree and xml.etree.ElementTree modules Why is this bad? Using various methods from these modules to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Replace vulnerable imports with the equivalent defusedxml package, or make sure defusedxml.defuse_stdlib() is called before parsing XML data. Example import xml.etree.cElementTree
